| 2019 | 2018

paragraph 1: Irish SIP
paragraph 2: The weighted average market value per ordinary share for Irish SIP options exercised in 2019 was 350.0p (2018: 387.5p). The SIP shares outstanding at 31 March 2018 have fully vested (2018: had a weighted average remaining vesting period of 0.1 years). Options exercised prior to the vesting date relate to those attributable to good leavers as defined by the scheme rules.

qa.question: What do the Options exercised prior to the vesting date relate to?
qa.answer: ['those attributable to good leavers as defined by the scheme rules.']
